channel.title: CVE Feed for Uniform Server Zero -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Uniform Server Zero -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5052|2024-05-13T06:53:44.172Z -- uniform%20server%20zero -- uniform%20server%20zero
item.description: vulnerability in Uniform Server Zero, version 10.2.5, consisting of an XSS through the /us_extra/phpinfo.php page. This vulnerability could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted query to an authenticated user and partially take over their session details.
